item.title: GIS Methods for Re-Wilding Spring 2024
item.description: Get to this page quickly: https://bit.ly/3HVp6vm 2/28 class map 2/28 class map. Resources May Crane Fellowships - Apply by March 8 for stipended work with GIS in the Map Collection, Summer 2024. Download QGIS - Instructions for installing Open Source desktop GIS software, with debugging tips. GIS Office Hours Tuesday 9:30-noon, Widener 240 - Every week through April 30, 2024. Make a 1:1 appointment with Belle - Please specify your preference for in-person or remote.
